title: Andersen Group Shares Gain 47% After $176 Million US IPO
description: Shares of Andersen Group Inc., the US arm of the professional services firm that succeeded the shuttered accounting giant Arthur Andersen, rallied 47% in its trading debut.
content: Shares of Andersen Group Inc., the US arm of the professional services firm that succeeded the shuttered accounting giant Arthur Andersen, rallied 47% in its trading debut.
